Jiang Zemin arrives
articles.content:
Jiang Zemin arrives 
    Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Jiang Semin, President of the People's Republic of China, arrived here today by a special plane to pay a visit to the DPRK.
 He was warmly greeted by Kim Jong Il, Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, at Pyongyang airport.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il greets Jiang Zemin at airport
Jiang Zemin pays homage to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Jiang Zemin pays homage to Kim Il Sung 
    Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Jiang Zemin, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China, today visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung.
 A floral basket was laid before the statue of Kim Il Sung in the name of Jiang Zemin.    
 Jiang Zemin made a bow to Kim Il Sung who lies in state for perpetuity and looked round orders and medals awarded to him by different countries and the mourners' hall  Jiang Zemin made an entry in the visitor's book.

Tete-a-tete talks held between Kim Jong Il and Jiang Zemin
articles.content:
Tete-a-tete talks held between Kim Jong Il and Jiang Zemin
    Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) - Tete-a-Tete talks were held here today between Kim Jong Il, General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and Chairman of the National Defence Commision of the DPRK, and Jiang Zemin, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China.
 The talks proceeded in a sincere and friendly atmosphere.
